snippet.title: Perth postal worker stomped on ground
snippet.content: A 71-year-old postal worker in Perth has been knocked off her motorbike by a man and repeatedly kicked as she lay on the ground. Police say she was delivering mail on Templeman Place in Midland about 1.30pm on Thursday when the man attacked her. The woman suffered minor injuries and was discharged from St John of God Midland Hospital on Thursday. Police are still looking for the man, who is described as being aged in his 20s, unshaven with tanned skin and wearing a black hoodie. Originally published as
